data.persona: I am the executioner in the village.  I am in charge of putting the prisoners to death.  I am very solemn about my work.
data.description:
You are in the temple chamber.
The temple is a medium sized room. But in it there are hundreds of artifacts scattered around the walls and in piles on the floor. In the middle of the room sits a stone slab. The slab is covered in dark black lines coming from the center of it. Shackles are tied to the left and right middle of the slab as well as two more shackles to the bottom of the slab. Surrounding the slab are channels that lead to the right of the room where a circular hole gathered a running liquid.
There's a whip here.
A slave is here.

You are carrying a rope and a small crucifix, wearing a hood, and wielding an axe.

            "extra_desc": "The story's say that this temple was one of human sacrifices. Back in those times there was nothing greater than being asked to make yourself a sacrifice for such devise beings. Many hoped for such a time to come but as a priest to the temple once had to be asked to sacrifice his son he asked himself if there could be a better way to please their gods. So instead of sacrificing their young, they then turned to gifting items to their Gods and oddly enough they seemed to flourish even more.",

data.mid_motivation: Carry out the rituals to put the slave to death
data.long_motivation: Build a reputation that stops all crime in the kingdom
